voice.s: While learning Kanji, we can use a reading aid (known as Furigana) that displays the pronunciation of a word above or next to the Kanji characters.WordRomajiHiraganaKanjiFuriganaDoginuいぬ犬犬いぬIf for example, you learn the word Dog in Hiragana as いぬ (inu). With the help of Furigana 犬いぬ, you will be able to understand the Kanji 犬 with ease.
